caption.p: Distribution of Recover, Deaths and Active cases (label) of Coronavirus (COVID-19) in various Indian states as of 01 April 2020. AP Andhra Pradesh, A&N Andaman and Nicobar Islands, BH Bihar, CDG Chandigarh, CHG Chhattisgarh, DL Delhi, GOA Goa, GUJ Gujarat, HAR Haryana, HP Himachal Pradesh, J&K Jammu and Kashmir, KAR Karnataka, KER Kerala, LAK Ladakh, MP Madhya Pradesh, MAH Maharashtra, MAN Manipur, MIZ Mizoram, ODI Odisha, PUD Puducherry, PNB Punjab, RAJ Rajasthan, TN Tamil Nadu, TEL Telangana, UKD Uttarakhand, UP Uttar Pradesh, WB West Bengal, AS Assam, JHA Jharkhand, ARP Arunachal Pradesh, TRI Tripura.
